entry.title: soothe the ache away
entry.summary:
Author: Tauria

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,786Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 34

Summary: Jason runs a hand over her hair, fingers stroking over her curls. “You’re not dying,” he says fondly. “The ibuprofen will kick in soon.” Steph jerks her head up, balancing on her elbows. “Not dying? I am bleeding out as we speak—and you, my loving boyfriend, have the audacity to say that I am not dying?”  His eyes crinkle, shoulders shaking as he suppresses his laughter. “You’re right—how cruel of me. I’m sorry, darling, how ever can I make it up to you?”  Steph wrangles the grin off of her mouth, twisting it into a thoughtful frown instead. It’s hard when all her lips want to do is twitch upward. She rolls over, onto her back, head pillowed on his thighs, and taps her chin. “Hm… It was very rude of you,” she tells him, and he nods seriously. “To earn my forgiveness, you must… Draw me a bath. And… hand feed me chocolates.” Steph’s joking, of course. She’d never turn down the chance to either a) spend time naked with him or b) stuff herself with chocolate, but she doesn’t expect Jason to actually do it. Obviously that means he does.

entry.title: i’ve been on my knees (change the prophecy)
entry.summary:
Author: Cas_grippedyoutight

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,536Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 91

Summary: Steph never understood Nocturna. The criminal was annoyingly mysterious, and seemed to have an odd fixation on her. She said it was because Steph reminded her of someone, but never elaborated. It seemed she would be getting her answer soon enough though. “What did you just say?” Steph jumped slightly and turned around in surprise. She had never heard Jason sound like that before. She couldn’t place the emotion in his voice, and his face was pale, almost drained of blood.“I… had to take a detour to stop Nocturna?” She answered cautiously.“That’s not possible. She died when I was still Robin.”Dick interjected, his voice stiff as he turned an accusatory glare on Bruce. “Did you not tell him?”“I didn’t think it was relevant.” The oldest man replied stiffly.Steph’s brow furrowed. “I’m missing something. What—”“Not relevant?” Jason straightened up, turning wide eyes on Bruce. “You don’t think it’s important for me to know that my— that she— she’s alive?”

entry.title: it seems you want me to take control (do you like that?)
entry.summary:
Author: Cas_grippedyoutight

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,315Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 35

Summary: His fingers itch to reach, to touch, to do something, but he keeps them dutifully at his sides, clenching and unclenching his fists. She shifts, slightly, and sinks both of her hands into his hair, moving his head until he’s staring up at her. Her towel has fallen open, but it’s fighting a valiant fight,“That’s okay.” Her lips look so smooth. Jason bets she uses lip masks and lip scrubs and chapsticks religiously. She seems like that type of girl. She tugs on his mask. “Can I take this off of you?”In which Jason cries during sex, Steph proves to be petty and hot, and both of them might be in love. It's really a work in progress.

entry.title: Ghosts of Smoke and Lavender
entry.summary:
Author: Omiga91

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,125Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 115

Summary: Jason Todd never expected to be liked. Feared? Respected? Sure. But somehow, despite everything, the people of Park Row have started to trust him—to rely on him. And, against his better judgment, he finds himself caring in return.Then, in the middle of a bust, he finds Freya Stradler—a five-year-old with a British accent, a tracking hex on her soul, and a face that reminds him of someone he’s been getting dangerously close to.Jason went to bat-detective school and can put two and two together. But his Bat and All-Caste instincts are both screaming that this isn’t just a case—this is going to be a soul-wrenching quest.

entry.title: Getting Lost in the Flames
entry.summary:
Author: DG_Outlaw

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 110,204Chapters: 34/?Kudos: 108

Summary: After recent events, Jason Todd and Stephanie Brown have been feeling lost and directionless but in different ways. Steph needs to find her Batgirl groove again after her death and resurrection, and Jason needs something to do that isn’t being in Gotham City or chasing after the Joker… or so he’s told.When Steph stumbles upon a case involving a new street drug called Bliss, afflicting River City, she decides to go undercover as a student teacher to stop whoever is behind the new drug and hopefully find her hero mojo along the way. What she doesn’t expect is having Jason Todd as a partner, not to mention her growing feelings and attraction to him, that she’s been trying to ignore for years.Going undercover with Steph was the last thing Jason wanted to do, but not because of her. If anything, working with her has always been the easiest thing in the world because they get along so well. The problem is dealing with his heart whenever he’s around her. Despite all his efforts to keep his feelings locked away, she always manages to stir something up inside him... and it scares him to death. Then again, he’s been dead before so maybe a moth has no choice but to fly into the flames.

entry.title: Question and Spoiler: A Wild Clue Chase
entry.summary:
Author: ChewBaxter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,668Chapters: 1/10Kudos: 4

Summary: “You don’t have the context of the mission to--”“I don’t care about context!” Stephanie yelled to interrupt again. “He’s out there, he’s dangerous, he’s killed people before; I have to make sure he doesn’t do that again! I’m going to find him, kick his ass, and drag him back to jail myself if I have to.” She listed off with her fingers. “Or, you can take me with you. Tell me on the way, and I’ll tell you why he started in Metropolis.”Renee blinked, stunned. She hadn’t mentioned Metropolis. Steph smiled purposefully.“You know where he is?"“I do now,” she laughed.When the Riddler and Cluemaster (among others) escape Blackgate Prison, rumours begin to circulate about the two clue-based villains working together to develop some kind of plot. Unable to prioritise it, Batman puts Renee Montoya, The Question, on the trail of Cluemaster to figure out what it is while they keep an eye on Riddler. Before Renee can leave, however, she’s ambushed by the blonde, purple-clad heroine Stephanie Brown, aka Spoiler, who put her target in prison in the first place. And she wants to kick his ass again. But when they get on the trail, what was supposed to be a short journey turns into a multi-state road trip!

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,542Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 87

Summary: The soft press of lips was a gentle contact Jason wasn't familiar with, he'd rarely gotten close enough to anyone to feel comfortable. But Steph was different, she was kind, and gentle, and he trusted her, and when she ran her tongue across the seam of his lips, he opened his mouth for her.When they parted they were both breathing heavily, lips kiss bruised, and connected by a string of spit. Jason wiped his mouth, staring up at the gorgeous woman on his lap."You've never kissed anyone before either," she guessed, still holding his face in her hands.Jason hid his blushing face in her neck, causing Stephanie to laugh and move her hands to his shoulders.
